class.name: TextureCubemapRD
class.brief_description: Texture for Cubemap that is bound to a texture created on the [RenderingDevice].
class.description: This texture class allows you to use a cubemap texture created directly on the [RenderingDevice] as a texture for materials, meshes, etc. [b]Note:[/b] [TextureCubemapRD] is intended for low-level usage with [RenderingDevice]. For most use cases, use [Cubemap] instead.
